import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from '../services/AuthService'; import { UserService } from '../services/UserService'; import { CommonFunctionalityService } from '../services/CommonFunctionalityService'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav-menu', templateUrl: './nav-menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav-menu.component.css'] }) export class NavMenuComponent { isExpanded = false; isLoggedIn = false; collapse() { this.isExpanded = false; } toggle() { this.isExpanded = !this.isExpanded; } }
